name: MEKA SIGURAT
description:
A game by kartyd

Can you survive in the MEKA SIGURAT?

MEKA SIGURAT FEATURES


  • Physically simulated enemies! Blast their limbs off!
  • Minimal AI cheating! Stealth-action supported!
  • Upgrades that can be equipped to boost your abilities!
  • Hireable mercenaries to make you feel less alone!
  • Huge SHOP with loads of different weapons and items!
  • Selectable wave types for different skill levels and challenges!
  • Grapple hook!
  • Placeable sentry guns and cover walls!
